articles.title: 2026 FIFA World Cup draw live updates: Find out who the U.S. and other nations will face in the group stage
articles.description:
The 12 four-nation "Groups" will be determined on Friday. The schedule (and specifically who will come to Gillette Stadium for the first round of the tournament) will be announced on Saturday.

The post 2026 FIFA World Cup draw live updates: Find out who the U.S. and other nations will face in the group stage appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: ‘I be forgetting what happened on offense’: Even on career night, Jordan Walsh only remembers his defensive plays
articles.description:
